SVGAnimatedBooleanAnimVal.summary: The animVal read-only property of the interface represents the current animated value of the associated animatable boolean SVG attribute. If the attribute is not animated, animVal is the same as .

remarks.para: Some boolean SVG attributes, such as preserveAlpha, are animatable. In such cases, SVGAnimatedBoolean.animVal property is true when the attribute value resolves to true. Otherwise, the value is false.

SVGAnimatedBooleanAnimVal.value: A boolean; the value of the animatable boolean attribute.
